pages.text: These are all of the recipe changes that aren't for one mod in specific.

$(li)Time in a Bottle is now crafted in the Spectrum Complex with the following items:$(li2)2 Citrine Shard$(li2)Onyx Shard$(li2)2 Mana Diamond$(li2)Budding Amethyst$(li2)2 Refined Malachite$(li2)Glass Bottle$(li2)Powders: 4 C, 16 M, 4 K$(li)Nature's Compass needs Cyan Pigment instead of Saplings.

$(li)Luminous Pearls are now crafted in the Pigment Pedestal using either Shimmerstone or Yellow Pigment, with the latter doubling the yield.$(li)Accessors are crafted in the Pigment Pedestal with various thematic resources depending on tier.
